entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 15 May 2016
